segments.text: Bob , can I talk to you for a minute ? There have been some developments for the Stewart case that I really need to talk to you about .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , what's the matter now ? We've had so much trouble with this case already . Don't tell me there's more bad news .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I'm afraid there is . I have some bad news for you about the results of the forensic tests ... there won't be any results .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ? What does that mean ? Why won't there be any results ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hate to tell you this , but it seems that every shred of evidence that would help us to convict were destroyed in a laboratory fire . There's nothing left . I'm so sorry ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , no , you can't be serious . I never expect anything like this would happened . What are we going to do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There's nothing that can be done . Everything is gone . I wish I could tell you differently , but what has happened has happened . We will just have to figure out a way to move on .
segments.speaker: S1
